document_data.name: Beldroth
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Beldroth''' was an inhabitant of [[Cormanthor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]] and a mage in service of the [[Coronal]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|261}}, Beldroth was involved in the laying of the ''[[mythal]]''. Though not a part of the inner ring of mages, he was responsive enough that [[Uldreiyn Starym]]'s treachery struck him first.
